inclusion.criterion: COPD on home O2 (5L NC) with baseline saturation high 80's to low 90's on this therapy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pulm HTN (RSVP 75 in [**11-24**]) thought secondary to longstanding ASD
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: COPD participants currently on oral steroids (i.e. prednisone), phosphodiesterase type 5 (PDE5) inhibitors or supplemental O2 therapy will be excluded.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused.
